description: Take your cottage pie to the next level with a delicious cauliflower cheese mash topping.
name: Cauliflower Cheese Cottage Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium onions, peeled and finely diced
0.25 bunch thyme, leaves picked and finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large, non-stick pan on medium heat and cook the onions, thyme and carrots for 5 minutes, stirring. Stir in the garlic and mince and cook for 4-5 minutes.
Stir in the tomato puree and cook for 1 minute. Add the stock and partially cover with the lid. Cook for 15 minutes until reduced.

Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Cook the potatoes in a large pot of boiling water for 8-10 minutes, until tender. Add the cauliflower and cook for 7 minutes. Drain well, mash to a coarse mix and stir in the creme fraiche and cheddar.
Pour the mince into an ovenproof dish, pile the cauliflower cheese mash on top and bake for 30 minutes, until golden and bubbling.
